name: Mystery in Amestris
description:
There is a mystery in Amestris!

This a fangame in the universe of FullMetal Alchemist. Don't worry: you don't need to be familiar with it in order to play. It is also spoiler-free.

Interrogate the suspects, gather information, solve puzzles… and find out what is going on!

That's my first try at a game with a story. And I'm very proud of the pixel art.

Controls:

- arrows to move

- Z to validate

- C to leave a dialogue
